document_data.name: Takahashi Yamaguchi
document_data.mainbody: '''Takahashi Yamaguchi''' was the leader of the [[ninja]] [[Yamaguchi clan]] in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.Personality: Takahashi was a man of honor, never brooking an agreement. If anyone betrayed him Takahashi would do anything to have revenge.
document_data.History:
Takahashi trained in ninja arts inside the [[Warazama clan]] until that clan was destroyed by internal dissents. So Takahashi formed a own ninja clan, the Yamaguchi clan.
One of first missions of Yamaguchi ninja was in [[1358 DR]] spreading chaos in the town of [[Aru]].
